features.description: Docs headings use same size hierarchy as Blog
steps: Navigate to a docs page with multiple heading levels
Verify h1-h6 have correct sizes and spacing
Verify h2 has bottom border separator
Compare with Blog page headings for consistency

features.description: Docs code blocks have white background and monospace font
steps: Navigate to a docs page with code blocks
Verify code blocks have white/light background
Verify code uses monospace font (IBM Plex Mono or fallback)
Verify syntax highlighting is working
features.notes: Fixed 2024-12-30: Added CSS overrides in globals.css for rehype-pretty-code/shiki

features.description: Docs inline code has proper styling
steps: View a docs page with inline code
Verify inline code has background color
Verify inline code uses monospace font
Verify proper padding and rounded corners
Navigate to a docs page with ul and ol lists
Verify unordered lists have muted bullet markers
Verify ordered lists have muted number markers
Verify proper spacing between list items
Navigate to a docs page with tables
Verify table has borders
Verify header row has background color
Verify proper cell padding
Hover over a heading in docs
Verify # anchor appears
Click anchor and verify URL updates
Verify smooth scroll to heading
Compare docs page padding with blog page
Verify content width is appropriate
Check sidebar alignment
Check TOC alignment
Resize browser to mobile width (375px)
Verify sidebar collapses or hides appropriately
Verify content is readable
Verify code blocks don't overflow
Navigate to a docs page with Mermaid diagrams
Verify diagram renders without overlapping text
Verify boxes and labels are properly aligned
Verify diagram is centered
features.notes: Fixed 2024-12-30: Reset Mermaid font-family to sans-serif in globals.css

steps: Check main text color is dark enough
Check muted/secondary text is readable
Check header navigation link colors
Verify contrast meets accessibility standards
